page.title: 04INDUSTRY
page.content: The area between Stonar Lake and Richborough Power Station is being developed as an Industrial Area. Some companies, such as Pfizer Ltd (Pharmaceutical Chemicals), Petbows Ltd (Engineers), Reinforced Shuttlecocks Ltd, Haffendens Moulding Co. Ltd (Rubber), Port Richborough Waste Paper Ltd and Astra Pyrotechnics Ltd, have been here for many years. Recently new companies have been arriving such as Eagle Sheds, Baddely Screen Printers Ltd, Regimental Replicas, The Piano Hospital, Audi-Volkswagen Distribution Centre, Beetle Workshop and GEFCO (UK) Ltd Vehicle Transporters. This industry flanks the main road, but land-fill & soil dumping is preparing adjacent areas for even more expansion for industry.
